website_summaries.verdict: Unless you live in a very small home and need a color router to match, skip D-Link's latest DIR-818LW in favor of more powerful options.
pros: The D-Link DIR-818LW Wireless AC750 Dual Band Gigabit Cloud Router is very compact, easy to use and available in four different colors
The device supports Gigabit Ethernet and has a convenient cloud feature
cons: The router has slow Wi-Fi data rates and short wireless range

customer_reviews.title: it looks bloody fantastic-and not like 99% of the routers on the market that would ...
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 700 square foot apartment with 300 Mbps bandwidth, and generally 10 devices on my network at any given moment. I also utilize many things that require a brad NAT table. I've had zero issues with this router, it looks bloody fantastic-and not like 99% of the routers on the market that would suggest I need to see a shrink about my depression, and definitely beats using the terrible combined gateway/routers your ISP is almost assuredly installing into your home. The real adventure was configuring the ISP's modem-router hybrid into a bridge successfully, but none of those travails were the fault of this router.
customer_reviews.author: smilingTolerantly

customer_reviews.title: support eager to address issues
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support! Contacted D-Link support and worked with agent number AR004620. He assisted with getting email notifications working (had to toggle enable authentication) and he agreed to include fix in the next firmware update to eliminate having to toggle authentication (current FW is 1.02). There is also a problem with recovering the internet connection after a power outage. The router requires a power cycle to recover internet connection after the modem powers back up (modem is Motorola SB6121 SURFboard). Also, they will address the router time being off by one hour (DST and time zones settings correct; however, time was not). Website filter feature works well and functions as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Diver Down

customer_reviews.title: D-Link Router Score 100 %!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace a 10-year-old D-Link router that finally died. I was amazed and delighted that it was up and running in a matter of hours. It would have been only minutes, if I hadn't bothered to read the manual and learn about the new features. The D-Link admin interface is still as excellent and intuitive as always, and it just got set up and worked fine, including the separate printer driver for my ancient HP 1200 Laser Printer. And the signal seems a little stronger than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley H. Zisk

customer_reviews.title: Great router at an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this router to replace an unreliable router I've had prior. wanted one with new AC technology that also had a 5Ghz dual band (better for streaming and gaming), this was perfect and at a great price! set-up is a breeze, it automatically has an id and password loaded that they give you on a card as a well as a sticker. once you plug it in and set it up on their IP page your good to go and can change your password or anything else you would like. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hilgeman

customer_reviews.title: Headache with the setup
customer_reviews.text: Poor setup document. I had to call in to setup this router. Also, something weird about its performance. First time called in to setup router. Everything setup but I did not check wireless speed so have to call again for speed issue. After another changes, I got speed. After few days, I had switched off power breaker for something else. Now, again issue with speed. Yet another call. Seems like it is not plug-n-play device at all.
customer_reviews.author: Juzer Fatehi

customer_reviews.title: Great router for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had the predecessor to this router for 4 years and never had an issue. This one is faster and supports AC, and I paid 35 dollars, which makes it a steal. It was no problem to set up, ran through everything automatically, with just a bit of input from me, and we are off and running. It covers every room of a two story house without issue.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Affordable router
customer_reviews.text: This is a good affordable router. The range is adequate. Media streaming within LAN is good. However, this can't be used as a bridge. Tried to find the settings for it but I can't seem to find it. Just used it as a router.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo Joseph Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Works well once configured correctly
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions for setting up as a regular router, but not so much if you need to configure differently. I wanted to extend my network using this product as an access point. Dlink instructions and web app didn't work so well. After working with it and searching for online videos, I found one that actually walked you through the manual setup process and now it works great. Only took about 4 hours to find the right video...
customer_reviews.author: JohnStPete

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality matches the price
customer_reviews.text: This product was reviewed on cnet.com as was noted as a dual band router with 11AC speed. I have a small apartment so I thought it would be great for my needs. After a couple weeks, I would lose internet frequently (5-7 times per week) and would need to restart the router. I just installed my old router and now it's working seamlessly. Really poor product and very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse R Hoole

customer_reviews.title: Bad on delivery - Quality issue
customer_reviews.text: It would not boot. Spent nearly 2 hours on a call with D-Link customer support to finally determine the router was bad. Spent another 30 minutes getting it repackaged for return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bubba

customer_reviews.title: When you look to this router, you can imagine ...
customer_reviews.text: When you look to this router, you can imagine a state-of-art equipment. It really is, when it works. My router works perfectly with wired connections, but it losts the configuration everytime I turn the router off. If I decide to connect a new wireless device, the same happens. I can see my wired connections working, but the wireless devices without internet connection. I had to go back to my cheap and simple TP-Link router that has a very limited range, very limited capacity, but it is very stable and trustable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Ciamponi Castro

customer_reviews.title: Was working...
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about 5 months and doesn't work anymore...and now it's to late to return. I learned my lesson. I will ALWAYS buy the protection plan! It's only a few extra bucks....
customer_reviews.author: IVIusicLover

customer_reviews.title: On line
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to set up. Can be programmed to do much ore than i will ever understand. Talks to the MyDLink app.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Murray

customer_reviews.title: great router and good service
customer_reviews.text: I like the router and have used dlinks in the past. They are the only router company that give free tech support on the phone for the life of the router. I needed help with the setup and a gentleman from Dlink was very helpful. He gave me his ID code if that helps you. It is AR4624 maybe you could ask for him.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Router
customer_reviews.text: We finally decided to upgrade our router, some linksys pos that finally crapped out on us. After searching the web and reading multiple reviews, we decided to purchase this router. The design was simple and aesthetically pleasing while the set-up was very easy for a non-techie person such as myself. Believe it or not, I'm more technologically capable than my husband! We were very pleased with our purchase and would definitely go with this router compared to our old linksys.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wang

customer_reviews.title: D-link routers rock!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, nice advanced configuration module for more security and QOS features. Great dual band range and fun colors! Pay attention to wireless limitations and you will find D-link equipment adequate to the job. Location is key to fast comms.
customer_reviews.author: ALS

customer_reviews.title: but it works great now! Thanks for your great product
customer_reviews.text: I had to contact seller to be able to set up bridge mode (really it was setting up a managed switch mode), but it works great now! Thanks for your great product, great price and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Another D grade product from D-Link
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING, but this does not even work with D-link cloud cameras without trouble. I bought two and several cameras for a security set up, but everything has to go back. I am really disappointed with the D-link product line: it is D grade, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: 5.0 GHz band has a very limited range
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1- Easy to install 2- The 2.4 GHz is working fine. 3- The coverage for 2.4 GHz band is OK 4- It looks good. Cons: 1- The 5.0 GHz band is not good. I see hiccups sometimes. 2- The range is very limited even less than my old LinkSys G router. Therefore I can not use it for Tvs that are not close to the router. You should be very close to the router to get all the bars. I've decided to return it back and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Kidra Shadroo

customer_reviews.title: the worst product i've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: the worst product i've ever purchased, wen i called for technical support they tried to extort $149 from me DO NOT BUY THE BIT OF EXPENSIVE NONSENSE!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Garrity Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product - a must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this router - especially the fact that I can control the passwords for both bands on an app. Also, dual band! This router is completely reliable on both frequencies!
customer_reviews.author: mahdafr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use thiis as an ethernet switch in my dorm. Great
customer_reviews.author: Michaeljurado

customer_reviews.title: Ok but without ability to update f8rmea
customer_reviews.text: Would never let me update the firmware even though it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I recommend it very easy to install, very good signal incredible distance
customer_reviews.author: guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Great consumer grade Wireless AP.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, especially the AC wireless. Great signal strength and great range, Good job Dlink!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as a gigabit router, I'm. It getting anything near the speeds for both channels 2.4 and 5GHz. It has the range, but I need to reset the router every couple days
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: it has provided better coverage in my home that previous N router
customer_reviews.text: Despite a hick-up while installing it, the unit could not figure out internet host's IP address by itself, it has provided better coverage in my home that previous N router.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe from Canada

customer_reviews.title: Loses connection and short range
customer_reviews.text: Seems to drop connection to my computer alot. Have had to reboot it sometimes in order to get reconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Bic Bones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sold mine because I got AT&T Uverse and couldn't use it. The person who bought it hasn't complained.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Heart

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap router
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't complain. Good wireless performance. Hard to beat at under $40.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Good speed and adequate coverage area
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for several year old router. Good speed and adequate coverage area.
customer_reviews.author: LY

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: It is small and few lights. It works well and so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great Router!
customer_reviews.text: Great router for the money. No problems, and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: This is a good router and easy to set up. and I will recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Bong Dela Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine for several months now. Nice screens for setup, and has guest network that can use different IP address ranges and subnet masks than the main network, so each network is separated. Also supports WPA2 wireless with different encryptions, so security is good. I can also setup my printer to be both accessible from my wired network and my wireless (or wired) Android phone. Great functionality!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: this did not meet what I needed. there was ...
customer_reviews.text: this did not meet what I needed. there was no N band on it. No specs listed when I bought it. I might have worked if I was dual band.
customer_reviews.author: Al Waldo

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this because I wanted to backup my photos ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I wanted to backup my photos to the cloud. Well, I was able to configure the wireless router with no problem. The issue is the mobile app is unusable to connect to the cloud.....which was my only purpose to buy the D-Link AC 750, as mentioned before, is to back up my phone photos. I should have read the reviews on the phone app first. Most people are having the same problem I am, so I do not feel alone. Don't buy, unless you just want a wireless router because that is what I ended up with and I really don't need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Woodgal

customer_reviews.title: Router arrived DOA. Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: This router arrived DOA... dead as a door nail. would not power up. Tried it in two different outlets and a power strip. Called D-Link and they said to return it. great. Will never buy anything else from them.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G - LFT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Mobile app worked without hiccup. Both speeds function as they should. Package was delivered before expected.
customer_reviews.author: THR

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: No good - Had to return a few weeks after using it. From day one, the range was horrible. If I were more than 15 feet away, with nothing in between me and the router, I would begin losing bars. After three weeks, I lost connection all together from all of my devices and could not reconnect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Merd

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I can not say the same for my ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I can not say the same for my experience with Comcast/xfinity.
customer_reviews.author: michelle minneapolis

product_meta.title: D-Link Wireless AC750 Dual-Band Gigabit Cloud Router, Black (DIR-818LW/D)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe DIR-818LW/D (Black) Wireless AC750 Dual Band Gigabit Cloud Router is a powerful wireless networking solution which combines the latest high-speed 802.11ac Wi-Fi specification with dual-band technology and fast Gigabit ports to deliver a seamless networking experience. The increased range and reliability of wireless AC technology reaches farther into your home and advanced security features keep your network and data safe. The DIR-818LW/D gives you Wi-Fi speeds of up to 750 Mbps (300 Mbps in 2.4GHz + 433 Mbps in 5GHz) and increased range. It also uses dual-band wireless allowing you to operate two concurrent high-speed Wi-Fi bands for ultimate wireless performance. Surf the web chat and play online games on the 2.4GHz band while simultaneously streaming digital media on the 5GHz band. In addition each band can operate as a separate Wi-Fi network giving you the ability to customize your network according to your connectivity needs. You can even configure a guest zone to give visitors Internet access without giving them access to the rest of your network.
feature_bullets: Uses the wireless AC technology to deliver fast wireless connectivity with increased range and reliability
Dual-band wireless for combined connections of up to 750 Mbps
10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet WAN port for speedy Internet access
Four 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports give you high-speed wired connectivity
Next generation wireless technology - wireless AC750 for optimized performance and reliable coverage
Dual Band Performance - deliver fast wireless 11AC speed and less interference for maximum throughput
Backward compatibility - compatible with existing a/b/g/n devices
Mydlink cloud management - monitor and manage your network from anywhere
Wired connectivity - connect more devices with four Gigabit Ethernet ports
Easy setup with intelligent browser wizard and quick router setup mobile app
Preset security with advanced WPA2 encryption

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars114 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
